languages.text: {n}Ваш спутник отвечает чужаку язвительной улыбкой.{/n} "Караэль... ну конечно. Не удивлен, что именно тебе, гонцу моей сестры, удалось пережить гибель своей хозяйки. Зачем же ты здесь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваш спутник отвечает чужаку язвительной улыбкой.{/n} "Караэль... ну конечно. Не удивлен, что именно тебе, гонцу моей сестры, удалось пережить гибель своей хозяйки. Зачем же ты здесь?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Your companion responds to the stranger with a wry smile.{/n} "Kharael... But of course. I am not surprised that it was you, my sister's envoy, who managed to survive the death of his mistress. Why are you here?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш спутник отвечает чужаку язвительной улыбкой.{/n} "Караэль... ну конечно. Не удивлен, что именно тебе, гонцу моей сестры, удалось пережить гибель своей хозяйки. Зачем же ты здесь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Your companion responds to the stranger with a wry smile.{/n} "Kharael... But of course. I am not surprised that it was you, my sister's messenger, who managed to survive the death of his mistress. Why are you here?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Your companion responds to the stranger with a wry smile.{/n} "Kharael... But of course. I am not surprised that it was you, my sister's messenger, who managed to survive the death of his mistress. Why are you here?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Your companion responds to the stranger with a wry smile.{/n} "Kharael... But of course. I am not surprised that it was you, my sister's envoy, who managed to survive the death of his mistress. Why are you here?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Your companion responds to the stranger with a wry smile.{/n} "Kharael... But of course. I am not surprised that it was you, my sister's envoy, who managed to survive the death of his mistress. Why are you here?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Your companion responds to the stranger with a wry smile.{/n} "Kharael... But of course. I am not surprised that it was you, my sister's envoy, who managed to survive the death of his mistress. Why are you here?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Dein Gefährte reagiert mit einem trockenen Lächeln auf den Fremden.{/n} "Kharael ... Natürlich. Es überrascht mich nicht, dass Ihr es seid. Der Gesandte meiner Schwester, der den Tod seiner Herrin irgendwie überlebt hat. Warum seid Ihr hier?"
languages.original_text: {n}Your companion responds to the stranger with a wry smile.{/n} "Kharael... But of course. I am not surprised that it was you, my sister's envoy, who managed to survive the death of his mistress. Why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein Gefährte reagiert mit einem trockenen Lächeln auf den Fremden.{/n} "Kharael ... Natürlich. Es überrascht mich nicht, dass Ihr es seid. Der Gesandte meiner Schwester, der den Tod seiner Herrin irgendwie überlebt hat. Warum seid Ihr hier?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}你的同伴对眼前的陌生人露出了讥讽的笑容。{/n}“卡瑞尔……我就知道是你。你曾是我姐姐的特使，你的女主人死了，你却活了下来。不过，我一点都不意外。你来这里干什么？”
languages.original_text: {n}Your companion responds to the stranger with a wry smile.{/n} "Kharael... But of course. I am not surprised that it was you, my sister's envoy, who managed to survive the death of his mistress. Why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}你的同伴对眼前的陌生人露出了讥讽的笑容。{/n}“卡瑞尔……我就知道是你。你曾是我妹妹的特使，你的女主人死了，你却了下来。不过，我一点都不意外。你来这里干什么？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Votre compagnon gratifie l'étranger d'un sourire narquois.{/n} « Kharael... Évidemment. Je ne suis pas surpris que vous, l'émissaire de ma sœur, ayez survécu à sa mort. Que faites-vous ici ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Your companion responds to the stranger with a wry smile.{/n} "Kharael... But of course. I am not surprised that it was you, my sister's envoy, who managed to survive the death of his mistress. Why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre compagnon gratifie l'étranger d'un sourire narquois.{/n} « Kharael... Évidemment. Je ne suis pas surpris que vous, l'émissaire de ma sœur, ayez survécu à sa mort. Que faites-vous ici ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tu compañero responde al desconocido con una sonrisa llena de sorna.{/n} «Kharael... Por supuesto. No me sorprende que el enviado de mi hermana haya logrado sobrevivir a la muerte de su ama. ¿Por qué has venido?».
languages.original_text: {n}Your companion responds to the stranger with a wry smile.{/n} "Kharael... But of course. I am not surprised that it was you, my sister's envoy, who managed to survive the death of his mistress. Why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu compañero responde al desconocido con una sonrisa llena de sorna.{/n} «Kharael... Por supuesto. No me sorprende que el enviado de mi hermana haya logrado sobrevivir a la muerte de su ama. ¿Por qué has venido?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたの仲間は歪んだ笑みを浮かべる相手に応える。{/n}「カラエル…まあそうだろう。お前だったと知っても驚きはしない。我が姉の使節、主人の死においても生き残った者よ。なぜここにいる？」
languages.original_text: {n}Your companion responds to the stranger with a wry smile.{/n} "Kharael... But of course. I am not surprised that it was you, my sister's envoy, who managed to survive the death of his mistress. Why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの仲間は歪んだ笑みを浮かべる相手に応える。{/n}「カラエル…まあそうだろう。お前だったと知っても驚きはしない。我が姉の使節、主人の死においても生き残った者よ。なぜここにいる？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yoldaşın, yabancıya küçümseyici bir gülümsemeyle yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Kharael. Tabii ya! Ablamın elçisinin, hanımı öldükten sonra hayatta kalabilmesine hiç şaşırmadım.Neden buradasın?"
languages.original_text: {n}Your companion responds to the stranger with a wry smile.{/n} "Kharael... But of course. I am not surprised that it was you, my sister's envoy, who managed to survive the death of his mistress. Why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yoldaşın, yabancıya küçümseyici bir gülümsemeyle yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Kharael. Elbette! Hanımının ölümünün sonrasında hayatta kalmayı başaran kişinin ablamın elçisi olmasına hiç şaşırmadım. Neden buradasın?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
